Actions.Name: Smite the Anvil
Effects: Character takes 1 divine damage, or 1 divine damage twice times if it's marked.
Create a pool of quicksilver under the [name].

Actions.Name: Heat the Forge
Actions.Description: Create a pool of quicksilver under the [name]. Then, all foes not in cover from the [name] must save or become vulnerable and have a space of roaring flames dangerous terrain created adjacent to them. Then, the [name] deals 1 piercing damage, three times to all foes.

Combo.Name: Work Metal
Combo.Description: The [name] marks a foe in range. While marked, the foe is vulnerable+ and cannot benefit from armor or resistance. This mark and its associate effects ends if the foe ends their turn in a pool of quicksilver, but it consumes the pool and that foe becomes stunned.
